game.name: Leap Up no jutsu
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Leap Up No Jutsu is a simple casual game will help you to kill some time. Jump between two bamboo to void the falling spear.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Leap Up No Jutsu is a simple casual game will help you to kill some time. Jump between two bamboo to void the falling spear.

reviewHighlights.text: Leap Up no Jutsu, developed and published by Yin Games, is a minimalist arcade-style reflex challenge that captures the essence of simplicity in game...
Dirt cheap during sale, drops fast, and sells steady
